about_the_game:
It places you on a dangerous planet known as Zero, a lawless expanse teeming with hostile creatures.
Your mission: To navigate this unforgiving terrain, extract valuable resources through mining, and battle relentless waves of adversaries to secure your survival. As a bounty hunter, your skills will be pushed to the limits as you keep advancing.
detailed_description:
It places you on a dangerous planet known as Zero, a lawless expanse teeming with hostile creatures.
Your mission: To navigate this unforgiving terrain, extract valuable resources through mining, and battle relentless waves of adversaries to secure your survival. As a bounty hunter, your skills will be pushed to the limits as you keep advancing.
name: Bounty Hunters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Roguelike game with mining and bullet hell mechanics.
